acceptance_criteria:
- POST /api/ticks/:id/note with {message} body
- Note added with timestamp

closed_reason: Added POST /api/ticks/:id/note endpoint in server.go. Accepts JSON with message field, adds timestamped note with '(from: human)' prefix to tick, returns updated tick with computed isBlocked/column fields. Validates message is required. Added 6 tests covering basic usage, appending to existing notes, not found, empty/missing message, and method not allowed.
